    • Method Detail

      • getPosX

        int getPosX()
        Gives the x-axis position of the piece.
        Returns:
        An integer corresponding to the x-axis position of the piece.

      • getPosY

        int getPosY()
        Gives the y-axis position of the piece.
        Returns:
        An integer corresponding to the y-axis position of the piece.

      • getPos

        int getPos()
        Gives the position of the piece.
        Returns:
        An array containing the x-axis and the y-axis position of the piece.
